types.update: UPDATE  types SET name = ? WHERE id = ?

employees.update: UPDATE  employees SET name = ?, phone = ?, address = ?, types_id=? WHERE id = ?

contracts.update: UPDATE  contracts SET name = ?, date = ?, file = ?, employees_id=? WHERE id = ?

childrens.update: UPDATE  childrens SET name = ?, age = ?, employees_id=? WHERE id = ?
